translations: 同部族婚姻；同组结婚；同族结婚；[植] 同系配合，[生物] 同系交配

sentences.sentence: There is no antithesis between endogamy and exogamy;
sentences.translation: 内婚制和外婚制根本不构成对立；

sentences.sentence: The chief of these questions respect the origin of exogamy and of endogamy. As.
sentences.translation: 这些问题中最首要的是关于外婚制和内婚制的起源。
